swarm.js

Guideline

  1. Copy the code to clipboard
    1. Click the textarea below
    2. Press Ctrl+A to select the code
    3. Press Ctrl+C to copy the code
  2. Switch to your website
  3. Hit F12, or
    Right-click -> Inspect
  4. Click Console
  5. Paste the code to console: Press Ctrl+V
  6. Hit Enter
  7. Hit F12 again to close the console, or
    click the cross button WITHIN the dev panel
